channel.title: Soccer on mostlymaths.net
channel.description: Recent content in Soccer on mostlymaths.net

item.title: World Cup 2010: promising young player Mesut Özil
item.description: Mesut Özil From Wikipedia UPDATE: Added video of hi great goal against Ghana. I am not a big soccer fan. If I feel the craving for TV (if I don’t need to concentrate, I prefer to have the TV on while doing things) and there is football on, and nothing else I like more, I may watch a half, maybe even the full game. And now I’m watching what I expected to be a somewhat dull game: Germany-Australia.
